function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Delay in real estate transactions due to lockdown may impact confidence and lead to a financial crisis","Impact":"Decreased confidence in real estate and potential financial crisis","Mitigation":"Implement virtual property viewings and digital signing to enable transactions during lockdown","Technologies":"Virtual reality for property viewings, e-signature technology for document signing","People":"Buyers, sellers, real estate agents, lenders","Owner":"Real estate industry stakeholders"},{"Description":"Cancellation and postponement of sports events to curb disease spread leading to financial burden","Impact":"Financial burden on sports industry due to cancelled events","Mitigation":"Utilize virtual events or implement strict health protocols for safe events","Technologies":"Live streaming for virtual events, health monitoring technology for in-person events","People":"Athletes, event organizers, sports fans","Owner":"Sports industry stakeholders"},{"Description":"High demand to develop a COVID-19 vaccine leading to intense competition and pressure","Impact":"Intense competition and pressure on companies and academic institutions developing the vaccine","Mitigation":"Collaborate and share research findings to accelerate vaccine development","Technologies":"Biotechnology for vaccine development, data sharing platforms for research collaboration","People":"Researchers, biotech firms, academic institutions","Owner":"Biotech firms, academic institutions"}]}
